spiritsExplanation:
The workout 'Welcome to Norway Flow' clearly embodies the 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit, evidenced by the title and description that highlight a 'core-focused flow' and the 'flow' workout type. The presence of chill and downtempo music further supports a smooth, rhythmic experience, indicative of this spirit. Thus, a high score of 0.9 is assigned.

The imagery and setting in Norway suggest an 'Outdoor & Adventure' spirit. The serene surroundings and the use of an outdoor mat location align with this spirit. The destination focus on Norway implies an exploration and connection with nature, warranting a score of 0.8. 

The soothing and serene nature of the workout also positions it against other potential spirits such as 'High-Energy & Intense' and 'Sport & Agility,' which are not supported by the metadata.
